SEARCH
Module com.example.softmethproject4
Package com.example.softmethproject4

Class CHIStyleController

java.lang.Object
com.example.softmethproject4.CHIStyleController
public class CHIStyleController extends Object
This class defines the Controller for the CHIStyleView and also defines all attributes and elements on the CHIStyleView, as well as the methods behind each ActionEvent that occurs on that view and connects to the backend program.
Author:
Adwait Ganguly, Kennan Guan

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected void
    addTopping()
    This method is called whenever the user selects a topping in the CHIStyleView and presses the Add button to add that topping to the pizza.
    protected Size
    findSize()
    This method indicates which size of pizza the user selects.
    protected void
    initialize()
    This method initializes the CHIStyleView whenever it is loaded by the system.
    protected void
    removeTopping()
    This method is called whenever the user selects a topping in the Toppings ListView in the CHIStyleView and presses the Remove button.
    protected void
    resetToppings()
    This is helper method that resets the Topping ListView if the user decides to choose a different flavor.
    protected void
    setOptions()
    This method sets the ListView of toppings in the CHIStyleView dependent on which flavor option is selected.
    void
    setPizzaList(ArrayList<Pizza> list)
    This method sets the ArrayList of pizzas in the current order to the list that will be passed to the CurrentOrderController.
    protected void
    setPrice()
    This method sets the Total Cost text area to the cost of the selected Chicago Style pizza, based on flavor, size, and toppings.
    protected void
    setToppings()
    This method sets the ListView of Toppings based on the Pizza selected by the user.
    protected void
    submitOrder()
    This method is invoked when the user clicks the Add to Order method.

  • Constructor Details

    • CHIStyleController

      public CHIStyleController()

  • Method Details

    • setOptions

      protected void setOptions()
      This method sets the ListView of toppings in the CHIStyleView dependent on which flavor option is selected.

    • addTopping

      protected void addTopping()
      This method is called whenever the user selects a topping in the CHIStyleView and presses the Add button to add that topping to the pizza. If the user tries to add more than 7 toppings to their Build Your Own pizza or new toppings to a pizza with set toppings, the method will do nothing.

    • removeTopping

      protected void removeTopping()
      This method is called whenever the user selects a topping in the Toppings ListView in the CHIStyleView and presses the Remove button.

    • setPrice

      protected void setPrice()
      This method sets the Total Cost text area to the cost of the selected Chicago Style pizza, based on flavor, size, and toppings.

    • submitOrder

      protected void submitOrder()
      This method is invoked when the user clicks the Add to Order method. The pizza is added to the Order and an alert is shown to the user with confirmation. This method will do nothing if no pizza is selected to add.

    • initialize

      protected void initialize()
      This method initializes the CHIStyleView whenever it is loaded by the system.

    • resetToppings

      protected void resetToppings()
      This is helper method that resets the Topping ListView if the user decides to choose a different flavor.

    • findSize

      protected Size findSize()
      This method indicates which size of pizza the user selects.
      Returns:
      the size of the pizza that the user selected as a Size object.

    • setToppings

      protected void setToppings()
      This method sets the ListView of Toppings based on the Pizza selected by the user.

    • setPizzaList

      public void setPizzaList(ArrayList<Pizza> list)
      This method sets the ArrayList of pizzas in the current order to the list that will be passed to the CurrentOrderController.
      Parameters:
      list - is the list of pizzas in the current order.
